---
name: 'SDD: Risks, Constraints, and Contingencies'
about: Risks, Constraints, and Contingencies part of the Sound Design Document
title: "[SDD] Risks, Constraints, and Contingencies"
labels: _Sound Design
assignees: ''

---

* Memory limitations
* VO localization complexity
* Possible music licensing issues
* Time-sensitive features requiring placeholder audio
* Backup plans for critical-path audio systems
